ghost

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a list of list of cells that makes up the map, as well as starting positions for entities and the fruit count.

    • Method Detail

      • openFileRead

        public static java.util.Scanner openFileRead(java.lang.String filename)
        Takes in a filename, ensures the file exists and returns a Scanner linked to the file. If the file is not found, null is returned
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        Scanner or null

      • parseMap

        public void parseMap()
        Takes the map file called this.filename, and parses it into a two-dimensional List of cell objects, which is stored as this.cellMap.

      • displayLives

        public void displayLives(App app)
        Takes in a filename, ensures the file exists and returns a Scanner linked to the file.
        Parameters:
        app - the App on which the lives are being displayed

      • collectFruit

        public boolean collectFruit(int x,
                            int y,
                            App app)
        Takes in a filename, ensures the file exists and returns a Scanner linked to the file. If the file is not found, null is returned
        Parameters:
        x - the x position (in pixels) of the waka
        y - the y position (in pixels) of the waka
        app - the app that the waka belongs to
        Returns:
        boolean
